manage.Label your image as sensitive content: Label your image as sensitive content
manage.Clear Identity Content: This action will irreversibly remove your on-chain identity. Are you sure you want to continue?

hint.Committed Supporters: Supporters that are committed to transfer fund meets the rate. Creators can not pull payment manually once register to payment system
hint.Uncommitted Supporters: Supporters that are not committed to transfer fund meets the rate
hint.Clear Identity: Remove on-chain identity and get the refund
hint.Unregister: Remove Monthly Rate and get the refund
hint.Unnote Preimages: Withdraw the deposit for delay proxy
hint.Register to payment system: Register to Cryptopatronage payment system. Payment will automically transfer to your recipient account. (1% fee required)
hint.Add Monthly Rate: How much you require, monthly, for someone to be your supporter
